actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation

official_title: To designate additional segments and tributaries of White Clay Creek, in the States of Delaware and Pennsylvania, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
short_title: White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate additional segments and tributaries of the White Clay Creek in Delaware and Pennsylvania as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013
To designate additional segments and tributaries of White Clay Creek, in the States of Delaware and Pennsylvania, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
